OutputType: The bake output type to generate
OutputTypeR: The bake output type to generate in the Red channel
OutputTypeG: The bake output type to generate in the Green channel
OutputTypeB: The bake output type to generate in the Blue channel
OutputTypeA: The bake output type to generate in the Alpha channel
PreviewMode: The vertex color channel to preview
bSplitAtNormalSeams: If true, compute a separate vertex color for each unique normal on a vertex
bSplitAtUVSeams: If true, Compute a separate vertex color for each unique UV on a vertex.
